articles.title: Logical replication and decoding for Cloud SQL for PostgreSQL
articles.description: Check out new logical replication and decoding features for CloudSQL for PostgreSQL, enabling change data capture (CDC) for fast performance and improved use of data analytics pipelines.
articles.content: Last week, we announced the Preview of Datastream, our serverless and easy-to-use change data capture and replication service. Datastream currently supports access to streaming, low-latency data from… [+6447 chars]
